resources.approvalPendingMsg: You will receive an email when the order has been approved.
resources.loginFailureText: Error: Your order has been processed but there was a problem creating your account. Please try again.
resources.processingMsg: This order is now being processed.
resources.pendingMsg: Thank you, your order request has been received and payment is pending. Once payment has been approved we will process the order.
resources.emailMsg: An order confirmation email has been sent to __emailAddress__ detailing the order below.
resources.thankyouMsg: Thank you for your order on __orderDate__ at __orderTime__.
resources.AfterapprovalPendingMsg: After approval, you will need to provide payment information.
resources.loginSuccessText: Your account has been created. Thanks for registering.
